column4: Tesla CEO Musk breaks ground at Shanghai Gigafactory to launch China push
column5: SHANGHAI/BEIJING Tesla Inc  broke ground on Monday for its Shanghai Gigafactory where it plans to begin making its Model 3 electric vehicles (EV) by year-end  a first step in localizing production in the world's largest auto market. | Video

column4: CORRECTED-UPDATE 4-Tesla CEO Musk breaks ground at Shanghai Gigafactory to launch China push
column5: SHANGHAI/BEIJING  Jan 7 Tesla Inc broke ground on Monday for its Shanghai Gigafactory where it plans to begin making its Model 3 electric vehicles (EV) by year-end  a first step in localising production in the world's largest auto market.

column4: Musk tweets "looking forward to breaking ground" on Shanghai Gigafactory
column5: Jan 6 Elon Musk  Tesla Inc's chief executive  said in a tweet https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1082103637990625281 that he is looking forward to breaking ground on the new Tesla Shanghai Gigafactory on Monday.

column4: Nvidia says new self-driving platform to hit streets next year
column5: Nvidia Corp on Monday announced its Drive AutoPilot platform  with artificial intelligence technologies  that can enable the next level of self-driving cars by 2020  further strengthening its position in the industry.

column4: Nvidia says new self-driving platform to hit streets next year
column5: Jan 7 Nvidia Corp on Monday announced its Drive AutoPilot platform  with artificial intelligence technologies  that can enable the next level of self-driving cars by 2020  further strengthening its position in the industry.

column4: zGlue pitches 'chiplets' to make custom chips for startups
column5: Jan 7 A veteran of the world's two biggest chipmakers is hoping to make affordable custom silicon chips for startup companies by rolling out new software on Monday at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas.

column4: Qualcomm expands car computer chip lineup  adds music from Amazon
column5: Qualcomm Inc  on Monday expanded its lineup of car computing chips and broke them into tiers of different prices  similar to its chips for smartphones that power relatively budget-friendly handsets as well as premium models.

column4: Huawei launches server chipset as China pushes to cut reliance on imports
column5: HONG KONG Huawei Technologies Co Ltd [HWT.UL] on Monday launched a new chipset for use in servers  at a time when China is pushing to enhance its chip-making capabilities and reduce its heavy reliance on imports  especially from the United States.

column4: UPDATE 1-Huawei launches server chipset as China pushes to cut reliance on imports
column5: * Launches chipset called the Kunpeng 920  designed by HiSilicon

column4: China's Huawei launches server chipset as it taps new growth channels
